About Us

We aim to create a place for all anime fans to keep a record of all animes and manga watched and read We also provide a useful anime and manga recommendation database based on your preferences. Here you can read descriptions about animes as well as read user reviews and monitor ratings.

We also provide a space for all our users to discuss about anime and manga, and maybe fanboy or fangirl over them.
